resources.string:
Minesweeper is a puzzle game that features a grid of clickable cells with hidden mines scattered across the playing field. The goal of the game is to place all the cells with mines and open all the cells that do not contain mines. The player gradually opens the cells (or marks them mined) using hints about the number of adjacent mines shown in the opened cells. 

 Click on the gear button to select the difficulty level. 

 Click the button with the light bulb to watch ads and get the opportunity to use the hint in the passage. 

 To enable the safe mode of opening the cells, switch the toggle switch above the advertising banner (first make sure you have enough hints). 

 To start a new game, just swipe down the screen.
